title: Biometrics For A Better Gaming Experience
teaser: Video games are the newest arena for biometrics.
contentencoded:
Some game designers are looking to biometric feedback as a way to make video games more immersive and more personal than ever.

Noah Nelson of Turnstyle News, a tech and digital culture site from Youth Radio reports.
